Text: enron guaranty Cc reviewed the attached revised guarantee and find it acceptable but for the following two minor items Paragraph As I discussed with Sara and she found this acceptable we prefer to be more specific and replace the proposed the nature of the claim with the underlying agreement and the parties thereto Paragraph The insertion at the end of the Paragraph should begin with Capitalized Thanks Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday January PM To Cc Subject Consolidated Edison Company of New York Inc Please find attached our final draft of the Guaranty I have also attached a redlined version for your convenience Should you have any questions please contact me at the number referenced below See attached file GuarantyConsolidated Edison Co of NY A REDdoc See attached file GuarantyConsolidated Edison Co of NY Adoc Samantha M Boyd Sr Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Smith EBA Houston TX Phone Fax email File GuarantyConsolidated Edison Co of NY A REDdoc File GuarantyConsolidated Edison Co of NY Adoc

ceconyenron redlined isda schedule Cc as discussed attached is a cleaned up redlined version of the schedule as you know there are still several open issues but hopefully it will be easier to work from this document in the meantime i will work on redlining the csa and reviewing some of the open issues in the schedule that are in my court thanks for your help and have a great weekend enron isda doc enron isda doc
